ground_truth: He steps forward, and she grasps his shoulder, tossing back her long, straightened hair before stepping back as he steps forward. Her high-heeled, sandaled feet fall in with his dance step, and holding both her hands in his, he twirls her towards him, twisting her arms across her waist. Keeping their heads still, they move around in a circle, and she unravels from his hold, whacking his cheek with her fan and slapping his face with her long, tossing hair. They resume their initial position, holding waist and shoulder, and whirl altogether. She leans back seductively and flicks the fan, and Luke looks both startled and pleased as she flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the fan. He spins her again, and breaking from his hold, she dances an improvised solo, waving the fan in front of her chest, waist, and bottom. Luke smiles awkwardly and claps his hands vaguely to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, she disappears, only to reappear behind him, swaying wildly from side to side, waving the fan in front of her. He tries to reconnect, but she whacks him again, then settles back in his arms. Later, they walk back to their hotel, where Alicia, sipping champagne on a sofa in the lobby, uncrosses her legs and struts towards him. She strokes and kisses his cheek, while Rebecca turns away, trying to mask her disappointment. In New York, Rebecca sits glumly in the back of a Yellow Cab as it crosses Times Square. Her chin resting on one blue cashmere-gloved hand, she answers her mobile and then dives to the floor of the cab, finding her black and white dress. Suze is propelled across the room and buried under an avalanche of clothes as Tall D. Freak smiles at his neighbor. Rebecca, wearing her sample blue gloves, faces the group. At home, Rebecca runs to the fridge and frantically searches through the freezer, bringing out a huge block of ice with a credit card in the middle. She smashes the block onto the counter and the floor, banging at it with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel. She holds the smaller block to the floor and wrestles with it, using two hair dryers to melt it down, and eureka! Armed with the card, she goes to the store and spots a cute melon-shaped bag. It's the group leader, and Rebecca waves at Lainley, as the group leader clutches a shoe to her forehead. On the night of the ball, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca ride up in the lift, with Rebecca in a beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia glances down at her and smiles as the lift doors open onto a sumptuous ballroom.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: He advances, and she grips his shoulder, tossing back her lengthy, straightened hair before retreating as he advances. Her high-heeled, sandaled feet align with his dance step, and clasping both her hands in his, he spins her towards him, twisting her arms across her waist. Keeping their heads still, they revolve around in a circle, and she disentangles from his grasp, striking his cheek with her fan and slapping his face with her long, tossing hair. They resume their original stance, holding waist and shoulder, and spin all together. She leans back alluringly and flicks the fan, and Luke appears both startled and pleased as she flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the fan. He rotates her again, and breaking from his grasp, she dances an improvised solo, waving the fan in front of her torso, waist, and bottom. Luke grins awkwardly and claps his hands indeterminately to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, she vanishes, only to reappear behind him, swaying wildly from side to side, waving the fan in front of her. He attempts to reconnect, but she strikes him again, then settles back in his arms. Later, they walk back to their hotel, where Alicia, sipping champagne on a sofa in the lobby, uncrosses her legs and strides towards him. She caresses and kisses his cheek, while Rebecca turns away, trying to conceal her disappointment. In New York, Rebecca sits glumly in the rear of a Yellow Cab as it traverses Times Square. Her chin resting on one blue cashmere-gloved hand, she answers her mobile and then dives to the floor of the cab, retrieving her black and white dress. Suze is propelled across the room and buried under a cascade of clothes as Tall D. Freak smiles at his neighbor. Rebecca, wearing her sample blue gloves, faces the group. At home, Rebecca rushes to the fridge and frantically searches through the freezer, bringing out a huge block of ice with a credit card in the middle. She shatters the block onto the counter and the floor, pounding at it with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel. She holds the smaller block to the floor and grapples with it, using two hair dryers to melt it down, and eureka! Armed with the card, she goes to the store and spots a cute melon-shaped bag. It's the group leader, and Rebecca waves at Lainley, as the group leader clutches a shoe to her forehead. On the night of the ball, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca ascend in the lift, with Rebecca in a beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia glances down at her and smiles as the lift doors open onto a sumptuous ballroom.

The block is smashed onto the counter and floor, it being banged at with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel. The smaller block is held to the floor by her, and with it, she wrestles, two hair dryers being used to melt it down, and eureka! Armed with the card, the store is gone to by her, a cute melon-shaped bag being spotted. It's the group leader, and at Lainley, Rebecca waves as a shoe is clutched to her forehead by the group leader. On the night of the ball, the lift is ridden up in by Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca, Rebecca being in a beaded black and silver jacket. Down at her, Alicia glances and a smile is given as the lift doors open onto a sumptuous ballroom.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He steps forward, and she grasps his shoulder, tossing back her hair. Her high-heeled, sandaled feet sync with his steps, and he twirls her, twisting her arms across her waist. They circle, and she unwinds, hitting his cheek with her fan and hair. Returning to their initial pose, they whirl together. She leans back seductively, flicking the fan, and Luke looks startled yet pleased as she flutters her eyelashes. He spins her, and she breaks free, performing an improvised solo with the fan. Luke smiles awkwardly, clapping to her unpredictable dance. Suddenly, she disappears and reappears, swaying with the fan. He tries to reconnect, but she whacks him again before settling in his arms. Later, they return to the hotel, where Alicia greets him with a kiss. Rebecca turns away, hiding her disappointment. In New York, Rebecca sits gloomily in a Yellow Cab crossing Times Square. Resting her chin on a blue gloved hand, she takes a call, dives to the cab floor, and finds her dress. Suze is buried under clothes as Tall D. Freak smiles at his neighbor. At home, Rebecca rushes to the fridge, finds a block of ice with a credit card inside, and smashes it with heels, using hair dryers to melt it. Armed with the card, she goes to the store and spots a melon-shaped bag. At the ball, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca arrive in a lift, Rebecca in a beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia smiles as the lift opens to a sumptuous ballroom.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: He steps forward, she grasps his shoulder, and her hair tosses back as she steps back. Her sandaled feet move with his dance step; he twirls her, twisting her arms across her waist. They circle; she whacks his cheek with her fan and hair. Resuming their position, they whirl again as she seductively leans back, fluttering her eyelashes. He spins her, and she performs a solo, waving the fan. Luke claps awkwardly, and she reappears behind him, swaying with the fan. He reconnects, but she whacks him and settles back in his arms. They return to their hotel, where Alicia kisses him, and Rebecca turns away, masking disappointment. In New York, Rebecca rides a Yellow Cab through Times Square, finds her dress, and answers her mobile. Suze is buried in clothes by Tall D. Freak, as Rebecca faces the group. At home, Rebecca smashes a huge ice block, freeing a credit card. She melts it with hair dryers, retrieves the card, and spots a melon-shaped bag at the store. On the ball night, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca arrive, with Rebecca in a beaded jacket; Alicia smiles as the ballroom doors open.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He steps forward with confidence, and she deftly grasps his broad shoulder, tossing back her long, straightened hair with a flair before gracefully stepping back as he moves forward. Her high-heeled, sandaled feet seamlessly match his dance step, and gently holding both her delicate hands in his, he skillfully twirls her towards him, intricately twisting her arms across her waist. With their heads remaining perfectly still, they proceed to move fluidly around in a circular motion, and as she elegantly unravels from his hold, she playfully whacks his cheek with her fan and intentionally slaps his face with her long, flowing hair. They seamlessly return to their initial position, holding each other firmly by the waist and shoulder, and together they whirl in unison. She leans back with a seductive air and flicks her fan enticingly, and Luke appears both startled and pleased as she flirtatiously flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the fan. He spins her once more, and breaking free from his hold, she dances an improvised solo, energetically waving the fan in front of her chest, waist, and bottom. Luke smiles awkwardly, an uncertain expression on his face, and claps his hands vaguely to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, she vanishes from sight, only to reappear unexpectedly behind him, swaying wildly from side to side, energetically waving the fan in front of her. He eagerly tries to reconnect, but once again, she whacks him playfully, then settles back into his arms. Later, they stroll together back to their hotel, where Alicia, elegantly sipping champagne on a plush sofa in the lobby, uncrosses her legs with an air of confidence and struts towards him. She gently strokes and kisses his cheek, while Rebecca turns away, trying her best to mask her disappointment. In the bustling streets of New York, Rebecca sits glumly in the back of a Yellow Cab as it makes its way across the vibrant heart of Times Square. Her chin resting forlornly on one blue cashmere-gloved hand, she answers her mobile phone and then quickly dives to the floor of the cab, retrieving her stylish black and white dress. Suze is catapulted across the room, buried under an avalanche of clothes, while a tall individual, known as Tall D. Freak, smiles at his neighbor. Rebecca, donning her sample blue gloves, faces the group with determination. At home, Rebecca rushes to the fridge in a frantic search through the freezer, eventually pulling out a huge block of ice with a credit card encased in the center. With determined force, she smashes the block onto the counter and the floor, banging at it with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel. She holds the smaller block firmly to the floor and wrestles with it vigorously, using two hair dryers to melt it down, and at last, eureka! Armed triumphantly with the card, she heads to the store and her eyes catch sight of an adorably cute melon-shaped bag. It's the group leader, and Rebecca waves enthusiastically at Lainley, as the group leader amusingly clutches a shoe to her forehead. On the spectacular night of the ball, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca ride up in the lift, with Rebecca wearing a dazzling beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia glances down at her with a knowing smile as the lift doors slide open onto a sumptuous, opulent ballroom.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: He confidently steps forward with an air of assurance, and she expertly grasps his broad shoulder, skillfully tossing back her long, straightened hair with a dramatic flair before gracefully stepping back as he continues to move forward. Her high-heeled, sandaled feet seamlessly match his intricate dance step, and he gently holds both her delicate hands in his own. He skillfully twirls her towards him, intricately twisting her arms across her waist in a beautiful, intertwining motion. With their heads remaining perfectly still, they proceed to move with fluid elegance around in a mesmerizing circular motion, and as she elegantly unravels from his gentle hold, she playfully whacks his cheek with her fan and intentionally slaps his face with her long, flowing hair. They seamlessly find their way back to their initial starting position, holding each other firmly yet gracefully by the waist and shoulder, and together they whirl in perfect unison. She leans back with a seductive air, enticingly flicking her fan, and Luke appears both startled and pleased as she flirtatiously flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the fan's delicate veil. He spins her once more, and just as she breaks free from his grasp, she dances a spirited improvised solo, energetically waving the fan in front of her chest, waist, and bottom with captivating flair. Luke smiles awkwardly, an uncertain expression playing on his face, as he claps his hands in a vague attempt to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, she vanishes from sight, only to reappear unexpectedly behind him, swaying wildly from side to side, energetically waving the fan in front of her with vibrant enthusiasm. He eagerly attempts to reconnect, but once again, she playfully whacks him before settling comfortably back into his arms. Later, they stroll side by side back to their hotel, where Alicia, elegantly sipping champagne on a plush sofa in the lobby, uncrosses her legs with an effortless air of confidence and strides towards him. She gently strokes and kisses his cheek, while Rebecca turns away, trying her best to disguise her disappointment. In the bustling and vibrant streets of New York, Rebecca sits glumly in the back of a Yellow Cab as it makes its way across the lively heart of Times Square. Her chin resting forlornly on one blue cashmere-gloved hand, she answers her mobile phone and then quickly dives to the floor of the cab, retrieving her stylish and chic black and white dress. Suze is suddenly catapulted across the room, finding herself buried under an avalanche of clothes, while a tall individual, known as Tall D. Freak, smiles at his neighbor with a knowing glance. Rebecca, donning her sample blue gloves with determination, faces the group with a renewed sense of resolve. At home, Rebecca rushes to the fridge in a frantic search, rooting through the freezer until she eventually pulls out a huge block of ice with a credit card encased in the very center. With determined force, she smashes the icy block onto the counter and the floor, banging at it with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel with vigor. She holds the smaller block firmly to the floor and wrestles with it vigorously, using two hair dryers to melt it down, and at last, eureka! Armed triumphantly with the card, she confidently heads to the store, where her eyes catch sight of an adorably cute melon-shaped bag on display. It's the group leader, and Rebecca waves enthusiastically at Lainley, as the group leader amusingly clutches a shoe to her forehead. On the spectacular night of the ball, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca all ride up in the elegant lift, with Rebecca wearing a dazzling beaded black and silver jacket that catches the light wonderfully. Alicia glances down at her with a knowing smile as the lift doors slide open to reveal a sumptuous, opulent ballroom.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: As he steps forward, she swiftly reaches out and firmly grasps his shoulder, tossing back her long, straightened hair with a fluid motion before she steps back just as he advances. Her high-heeled, sandaled feet seamlessly align with his rhythm as they engage in the dance, and with a graceful and coordinated movement, he takes both her hands in his own, executing a smooth twirl that pulls her towards him, causing her arms to twist across her waist. They maintain their heads in a steady position while their bodies pivot around in a synchronized circle. She skillfully unravels from his hold and playfully whacks his cheek with her fan, allowing her long, flowing hair to slap his face as it tosses around. Returning to their original stance, she places her hand on his waist while he holds her shoulder, and together they whirl around with energy and flair. In a seductive move, she leans back, flicking her fan teasingly while Luke looks on, caught between surprise and delight, watching her flutter her eyelashes at him from behind the fan's delicate screen. He spins her once more, and as she breaks free from his embrace, she performs an impromptu solo dance, artfully waving the fan across her chest, waist, and bottom. Observing her unpredictable display, Luke offers an awkward smile and claps his hands in a disjointed attempt to keep time with her rhythm. Abruptly, she vanishes from his view, only to reemerge behind him, swaying energetically from one side to the other, her fan slicing the air in front of her. He attempts to reconnect with her, but she playfully whacks him again before finally nestling back into his arms. Later, as they make their way back to the hotel, they find Alicia comfortably sipping champagne on a sofa in the lobby. With a deliberate motion, she uncrosses her legs and strides over to them, reaching out to stroke and kiss his cheek affectionately, while Rebecca turns away, subtly trying to conceal her disappointment. In New York, Rebecca sits sullenly in the backseat of a Yellow Cab as it navigates through the dazzling lights of Times Square. Her chin rests contemplatively on one hand, encased in a blue cashmere glove, as she answers her mobile phone, and then she dives to the cab's floor, reaching around until she retrieves her black and white dress. Meanwhile, Suze is propelled across the room amidst a chaotic avalanche of clothes as Tall D. Freak smiles at his neighbor, exuding confidence. Rebecca, now donning her sample blue gloves, stands confidently before the group. At home, propelled by urgency, Rebecca dashes to the fridge and fervently rummages through the freezer, extracting a massive block of ice with a credit card encased within it. With determined force, she hurls the ice block onto the counter and then the floor, pounding at it alternately with the sharp tip of a yellow stiletto heel and the solid bulk of a thicker wooden heel. Grasping the diminished ice block against the floor, she vigorously attacks it with the heat from two hair dryers, diligently melting the ice away until, finally, success! Armed with the liberated card, she heads to the store and spots an adorable melon-shaped bag. It's the group leader, and Rebecca waves enthusiastically at Lainley, while the leader comically presses a shoe to her forehead. On the night of the grand ball, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca ascend together in the elevator, with Rebecca stylishly clad in a beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia glances down at her, her expression forming into a soft smile, just as the elevator doors slide open, revealing the opulent grandeur of the sumptuous ballroom awaiting them.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
The couple begins a dance as she catches his shoulder, tossing her hair back and matching his steps in high-heeled sandals. Holding her hands, he twirls her in, twisting her arms across her waist, and they circulate, maintaining still heads until she unravels, playfully hitting him with her fan and hair. Returning to their starting pose, they whirl together, and she leans back, enticing him with a fan flick. Luke is both surprised and pleased as she flutters her lashes at him. He spins her, and she breaks away to perform a solo, waving her fan before her chest, waist, and bottom. Luke claps awkwardly to her unpredictable moves. She vanishes, only to reappear behind him, swaying and waving her fan. They reunite briefly, but she playfully whacks him again before returning to his arms. 

Later, they walk back to their hotel, where Alicia, sipping champagne in the lobby, approaches Luke, kissing his cheek as Rebecca turns away, hiding her disappointment. In New York, Rebecca sits dejectedly in a Yellow Cab through Times Square, answers her mobile, and dives for her dress on the floor. Suze is buried in clothes by Tall D. Freak, who smiles at a neighbor. Rebecca, in her sample blue gloves, faces the group. At home, Rebecca sprints to the fridge, fervently searching the freezer, and retrieves a large ice block encasing a credit card. She smashes it onto the counter, then the floor, using a stiletto and wooden heel to break it, then wrestles with the residue, melting it with hair dryers until she frees the card. Triumphant, she heads to the store, eyeing a cute melon-shaped bag, where she waves at Lainley, clutching a shoe to her forehead. On the ball night, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca ascend in the lift, Rebecca in a beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia smiles at Rebecca as the doors open to a lavish ballroom.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He steps forward, and she grasps his shoulder, tossing back her long, straightened hair, a style popularized by fashion icons in the early 2000s, before stepping back as he steps forward. Her high-heeled, sandaled feet, reminiscent of the elegant stilettos seen on Parisian runways, fall in with his dance step, and holding both her hands in his, he twirls her towards him, twisting her arms across her waist. Keeping their heads still, emulating the grace of professional ballroom dancers, they move around in a circle, and she unravels from his hold, whacking his cheek with her ornate fan, a piece often used in Spanish flamenco dance, and slapping his face with her long, tossing hair. They resume their initial position, holding waist and shoulder like traditional tango partners, and whirl altogether. She leans back seductively and flicks the fan, and Luke, who is not accustomed to such dynamic moves, looks both startled and pleased as she flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the fan. He spins her again, and breaking from his hold, she dances an improvised solo, a freestyle move that reflects the influence of contemporary dance, waving the fan in front of her chest, waist, and bottom. Luke smiles awkwardly, unsure of how to keep time with her rhythm, and claps his hands vaguely to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, she disappears, a maneuver common in theatrical dance performances, only to reappear behind him, swaying wildly from side to side, waving the fan in front of her. He tries to reconnect, but she whacks him again, then settles back in his arms. Later, they walk back to their luxurious hotel, where Alicia, sipping vintage champagne on a designer sofa in the lobby, uncrosses her legs and struts towards him. She strokes and kisses his cheek with an air of possessiveness, while Rebecca turns away, trying to mask her disappointment. In New York, known for its iconic skyline and cultural diversity, Rebecca sits glumly in the back of a Yellow Cab, synonymous with New York City transportation, as it crosses Times Square, the bustling heart of entertainment. Her chin resting on one blue cashmere-gloved hand, she answers her mobile and then dives to the floor of the cab, finding her black and white dress from an earlier fashion event. Suze is propelled across the room and buried under an avalanche of clothes as Tall D. Freak, her eccentric roommate, smiles at his neighbor. Rebecca, wearing her sample blue gloves, facing the group of friends who often gather for monthly style swaps, addresses them. At home, Rebecca runs to the fridge and frantically searches through the freezer, bringing out a huge block of ice with a credit card in the middle, a reminder of her overspending habits. She smashes the block onto the counter and the floor, banging at it with a yellow stiletto heel, an essential weapon for any fashionista, and then a thicker wooden heel from her collection of trendy clogs. She holds the smaller block to the floor and wrestles with it, using two hair dryers to melt it down with the urgency of a spy in a heist film, and eureka! Armed with the card, she goes to the exclusive designer store and spots a cute melon-shaped bag, an avant-garde accessory that's all the rage this season. It's the group leader, and Rebecca waves at Lainley, as the group leader, exhausted from a day of retail therapy, clutches a shoe to her forehead. On the night of the ball, a prestigious event set in Manhattan, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca ride up in the lift, with Rebecca in a beaded black and silver jacket, an homage to the glamorous art deco fashion. Alicia glances down at her and smiles as the lift doors open onto a sumptuous ballroom, decorated with opulent chandeliers and elegant flower arrangements, setting the stage for a night to remember.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: He steps forward and she grasps his shoulder tossing back her long straightened hair before stepping back as he steps forward. Her highheeled sandaled feet fall in with his dance step and holding both her hands in his. he twirls her towards him twisting her arms across her waist. Keeping their heads still they move around in a circle and she unravels from his hold whacking his cheek with her fan and slapping his face with her long tossing hair. They resume their initial position holding waist and shoulder and whirl altogether. She leans back seductively and flicks the fan and Luke looks both startled and pleased as she flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the fan. He spins her again and breaking from his hold. she dances an improvised solo waving the fan in front of her chest waist and bottom. Luke smiles awkwardly and claps his hands vaguely to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly she disappears only to reappear behind him swaying wildly from side to side waving the fan in front of her. He tries to reconnect but she whacks him again then settles back in his arms. Later they walk back to their hotel where Alicia sipping champagne on a sofa in the lobby uncrosses her legs and struts towards him. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. She strokes and kisses his cheek while Rebecca turns away trying to mask her disappointment. In New York Rebecca sits glumly in the back of a Yellow Cab as it crosses Times Square. Her chin resting on one blue cashmeregloved hand she answers her mobile and then dives to the floor of the cab finding her black and white dress. Suze is propelled across the room and buried under an avalanche of clothes as Tall D Freak smiles at his neighbor. Rebecca wearing her sample blue gloves faces the group. At home Rebecca runs to the fridge and frantically searches through the freezer bringing out a huge block of ice with a credit card in the middle. She smashes the block onto the counter and the floor banging at it with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel. She holds the smaller block to the floor and wrestles with it using two hair dryers to melt it down and eureka. Armed with the card she goes to the store and spots a cute melonshaped bag. It is the group leader and Rebecca waves at Lainley as the group leader clutches a shoe to her forehead. On the night of the ball Luke Alicia and Rebecca ride up in the lift with Rebecca in a beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia glances down at her and smiles as the lift doors open onto a sumptuous ballroom.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: He steps forward and she grasps his shoulder tossing back her long straightened hair before stepping back as he steps forward. Her highheeled sandaled feet fall in with his dance step and holding both her hands in his. he twirls her towards him twisting her arms across her waist. Keeping their heads still they move around in a circle and she unravels from his hold whacking his cheek with her fan and slapping his face with her long tossing hair. They resume their initial position holding waist and shoulder and whirl altogether. She leans back seductively and flicks the fan and Luke looks both startled and pleased as she flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the fan. He spins her again and breaking from his hold. she dances an improvised solo waving the fan in front of her chest waist and bottom. Luke smiles awkwardly and claps his hands vaguely to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly she disappears only to reappear behind him swaying wildly from side to side waving the fan in front of her. He tries to reconnect but she whacks him again then settles back in his arms. Later they walk back to their hotel where Alicia sipping champagne on a sofa in the lobby uncrosses her legs and struts towards him. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: He steps forward and she grasps his shoulder tossing back her long straightened hair before stepping back as he steps forward. Her highheeled sandaled feet fall in with his dance step and holding both her hands in his. he twirls her towards him twisting her arms across her waist. On the night of the ball Luke Alicia and Rebecca ride up in the lift with Rebecca in a beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia glances down at her and smiles as the lift doors open onto a sumptuous ballroom.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: The parrot steps forward, and the giraffe grasps the parrot's shoulder, tossing back the giraffe's long, straightened hair before stepping back as the parrot steps forward. The rabbit's high-heeled, sandaled feet fall in with the parrot's dance step, and holding both the giraffe's hands in the parrot's, the llama twirls the giraffe towards the llama, twisting the giraffe's arms across the giraffe's waist. Keeping their heads still, they move around in a circle, and the giraffe unravels from the llama's hold, whacking the llama's cheek with the giraffe's fan and slapping the llama's face with the giraffe's long, tossing hair. They resume their initial position, holding waist and shoulder, and whirl altogether. The giraffe leans back seductively and flicks the fan, and the zebra looks both startled and pleased as the giraffe flutters the giraffe's eyelashes at the zebra from behind the fan. The zebra spins the giraffe again, and breaking from the zebra's hold, the giraffe dances an improvised solo, waving the fan in front of the giraffe's chest, waist, and bottom. The zebra smiles awkwardly and claps the zebra's hands vaguely to accompany the zebra's unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, the giraffe disappears, only to reappear behind the zebra, swaying wildly from side to side, waving the fan in front of the giraffe. The zebra tries to reconnect, but the giraffe whacks the zebra again, then settles back in the zebra's arms. Later, the owl and the kangaroos walk back to their hotel, where the dolphin, sipping champagne on a sofa in the lobby, uncrosses the dolphin's legs and struts towards the owl. The dolphin strokes and kisses the owl's cheek, while the fox turns away, trying to mask the fox's disappointment. In New York, the fox sits glumly in the back of a Yellow Cab as it crosses Times Square. The fox's chin resting on one blue cashmere-gloved hand, the fox answers the fox's mobile and then dives to the floor of the cab, finding the fox's black and white dress. The platypus is propelled across the room and buried under an avalanche of clothes as the kangaroo smiles at the kangaroo's neighbor. The fox, wearing the fox's sample blue gloves, faces the group. At home, the fox runs to the fridge and frantically searches through the freezer, bringing out a huge block of ice with a credit card in the middle. The fox smashes the block onto the counter and the floor, banging at it with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel. The fox holds the smaller block to the floor and wrestles with it, using two hair dryers to melt it down, and eureka! Armed with the card, the fox goes to the store and spots a cute melon-shaped bag. It's the squirrel, and the fox waves at the penguin, as the squirrel clutches a shoe to the squirrel's forehead. On the night of the ball, the zebra, the dolphin, and the fox ride up in the lift, with the fox in a beaded black and silver jacket. The dolphin glances down at the fox and smiles as the lift doors open onto a sumptuous ballroom.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: He steps forward, and she grasps his elbow, tossing back her short, curly hair before stepping back as he steps forward. Her flat, boat-shoed feet fall in with his dance step, and holding both her hands in his, he twirls her towards him, twisting her arms across her hips. Keeping their heads still, they move around in a circle, and she unravels from his hold, whacking his cheek with her parasol and slapping his face with her short, bouncing hair. They resume their initial position, holding shoulder and elbow, and spin altogether. She leans back playfully and flicks the parasol, and Luke looks both surprised and amused as she flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the parasol. He spins her again, and breaking from his hold, she dances an improvised solo, waving the parasol in front of her head, hips, and knees. Luke smiles awkwardly and claps his hands vaguely to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, she disappears, only to reappear behind him, swaying wildly from side to side, waving the parasol in front of her. He tries to reconnect, but she whacks him again, then settles back in his arms. Later, they walk back to their hostel, where Alicia, sipping apple juice on a stool in the lobby, uncrosses her arms and strides towards him. She strokes and kisses his cheek, while Rebecca turns away, trying to mask her disappointment. In Seattle, Rebecca sits glumly in the back of a red sedan as it crosses Pike Place Market. Her chin resting on one green wool-gloved hand, she answers her tablet and then dives to the floor of the sedan, finding her red and blue scarf. Suze is propelled across the room and buried under an avalanche of newspapers as Tall D. Freak smiles at his neighbor. Rebecca, wearing her sample green gloves, faces the group. At home, Rebecca runs to the pantry and frantically searches through the cupboard, bringing out a huge block of chocolate with a key in the middle. She smashes the block onto the table and the floor, banging at it with a blue sneaker and then a thicker rubber boot. She holds the smaller block to the floor and wrestles with it, using two fans to melt it down, and eureka! Armed with the key, she goes to the boutique and spots a cute apple-shaped hat. It's the group leader, and Rebecca waves at Lainley, as the group leader clutches a glove to her forehead. On the night of the gala, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca ride up in the escalator, with Rebecca in a beaded red and gold shawl. Alicia glances down at her and smiles as the escalator doors open onto an exquisite theater.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He leans backward, and she pats his shoulder, flipping back her long, straightened hair before sliding back as he leans backward. Her high-heeled, sandaled feet drift in with his dance step, and holding both her hands in his, he nudges her towards him, wrapping her arms across her waist. Keeping their heads still, they slide around in a circle, and she releases from his hold, grazing his cheek with her fan and brushing his face with her long, flipping hair. They return to their initial position, holding waist and shoulder, and glide altogether. She tilts back seductively and waves the fan, and Luke appears both startled and pleased as she blinks rapidly at him from behind the fan. He swirls her again, and slipping from his hold, she strolls an improvised solo, fluttering the fan in front of her chest, waist, and bottom. Luke winces awkwardly and snaps his fingers vaguely to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, she vanishes, only to emerge behind him, wobbling wildly from side to side, fluttering the fan in front of her. He tries to reconnect, but she grazes him again, then nestles back in his arms. Later, they stroll back to their hotel, where Alicia, sipping champagne on a sofa in the lobby, uncrosses her legs and prances towards him. She caresses and brushes his cheek, while Rebecca turns away, trying to hide her disappointment. In New York, Rebecca sits gloomily in the back of a Yellow Cab as it cruises through Times Square. Her chin resting on one blue cashmere-gloved hand, she responds to her mobile and then dives to the floor of the cab, retrieving her black and white dress. Suze is thrust across the room and enveloped under an avalanche of clothes as Tall D. Freak winks at his neighbor. Rebecca, wearing her sample blue gloves, faces the group. At home, Rebecca dashes to the fridge and frantically rummages through the freezer, hauling out a huge block of ice with a credit card in the middle. She hurls the block onto the counter and the floor, tapping at it with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel. She holds the smaller block to the floor and battles with it, using two hair dryers to thaw it down, and eureka! Armed with the card, she heads to the store and spots a cute melon-shaped bag. It's the group leader, and Rebecca nods at Lainley, as the group leader holds a shoe to her forehead. On the night of the ball, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca glide up in the lift, with Rebecca in a beaded black and silver jacket. Alicia peers down at her and grins as the lift doors slide open onto a sumptuous ballroom.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The bookshelf steps forward, and the cactus grasps its lampshade, tossing back its long, ribbon-like leaves before stepping back as it steps forward. Its stiletto-wheeled cart rolls in with its waltz, and holding both its wheels in its, it twirls it towards it, twisting its axles across its frame. Keeping their lights still, they move around in a circle, and it unravels from its hold, whacking its corner with its leaf blower and slapping its surface with its long, tossing pages. They resume their initial position, holding cupboard and wallpaper, and whirl altogether. It leans back joyfully and flicks the leaf blower, and Max looks both startled and pleased as it flutters its feathers at it from behind the leaf blower. It spins it again, and breaking from its hold, it dances an improvised solo, waving the leaf blower in front of its steering wheel, bumper, and grill. Max smiles awkwardly and claps its hands vaguely to accompany its unpredictable gardening companion. Suddenly, it disappears, only to reappear behind it, swaying wildly from side to side, waving the leaf blower in front of it. It tries to reconnect, but it whacks it again, then settles back in its handle. Later, they roll back to their mansion, where Fiona, sipping tea on a hammock in the garden, uncrosses its strings and strides towards it. It strokes and kisses its pedal, while Greg turns away, trying to mask its surprise. In Los Angeles, Greg sits glumly in the back of a Green Wagon as it crosses Hollywood Boulevard. Its chin resting on one red velvet-gloved knee, it answers its pager and then slides to the floor of the wagon, finding its polka dot scarf. Erin is propelled across the field and buried under an avalanche of feathers as Zeta E. Alien smiles at its refrigerator. Greg, wearing its sample red gloves, faces the orchestra. At the office, Greg dashes to the pantry and frantically searches through the cupboard, bringing out a monumental jar of jam with a spoon in the middle. It shatters the jar onto the table and the floor, banging at it with a red umbrella handle and then a thicker iron wrench. It holds the smaller jar to the floor and wrestles with it, using two ceiling fans to melt it down, and eureka! Armed with the spoon, it goes to the bistro and spots a cute potato-shaped chair. It's the orchestra leader, and Greg waves at Quinn, as the orchestra leader clutches a balloon to its shoulder. On the night of the gala, Max, Fiona, and Greg ride up in the escalator, with Greg in a sequined green and gold boot. Fiona glances down at it and smiles as the escalator doors open onto a luxurious courtyard.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: The penguin waddles forward, and the dragonfly nudges its shoulder, flipping back its long, braided antennae before gliding back as the penguin waddles forward. Its high-heeled, webbed feet synchronize with its dance rhythm, and holding both its wings in its, it spins it towards itself, coiling its wings over its waist. Keeping their heads frozen, they glide around in a ring, and it unfurls from its grip, tapping its beak with a feather and brushing its face with its long, bouncing antennae. They return to their starting place, gripping waist and shoulder, and twirl in unison. It arches back suggestively and waves the feather, and Max appears both bewildered and delighted as it blinks its eyes at him from over the feather. He pirouettes it once more, and breaking free from its grip, it waltzes an impromptu solo, fluttering the feather before its neck, waist, and tail. Max grins awkwardly and slaps its hands vaguely to accompany its unpredictable twirling companion. Without warning, it vanishes, only to materialize behind him, swaying frenetically from one side to the other, flapping the feather before it. He attempts to reconnect, but it taps him once more, then nests back in its arms. Later, they glide back to their treehouse, where Leon, sipping espresso on a hammock on the porch, uncrosses its legs and prances towards him. It grazes and pecks its cheek, while Dani turns away, attempting to hide its dismay. In London, Dani sits somberly in the back of a Black Cab as it meanders through Piccadilly Circus. Its chin propped on one red velvet-gloved hand, it answers its mobile and then plunges to the floor of the cab, uncovering its black and white gown. Taylor is whisked across the floor and submerged under a mound of toys as Short B. Odd grins at its neighbor. Dani, wearing its prototype red gloves, addresses the assembly. At home, Dani dashes to the pantry and frantically rummages through the cooler, extracting a massive slab of ice with a train ticket in the center. It shatters the slab onto the table and the floor, pummeling at it with a blue ballet shoe and then a thicker leather boot. It grips the reduced block to the floor and grapples with it, employing two hand fans to dissolve it, and voila! Equipped with the ticket, it heads to the theater and notices a charming apple-shaped hat. It's the community elder, and Dani waves at Markie, as the elder presses a bicycle to its forehead. On the eve of the feast, Max, Leon, and Dani ride up in the elevator, with Dani in a sequined black and gold coat. Leon peers down at it and grins as the elevator doors unfurl onto a lavish banquet hall.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He leans inward, and she taps his elbow, flipping back her short, curled hair before hopping back as he leans inward. Her flat, laced feet mirror his marching step, and holding both her elbows in his, he swings her towards him, curling her arms behind her back. Keeping their eyes closed, they drift around in a circle, and she untangles from his grasp, patting his shoulder with her umbrella and brushing his nose with her short, flipping hair. They return to their starting stance, clutching waist and arm, and float together. She tilts back teasingly and waves the umbrella, and Luke looks both confused and delighted as she winks at him from behind the umbrella. He rotates her again, and slipping from his grasp, she trots an impromptu solo, twirling the umbrella in front of her knees, back, and head. Luke grins sheepishly and snaps his fingers vaguely to support his unpredictable dancing partner. Suddenly, she vanishes, only to pop up behind him, spinning wildly in place, swinging the umbrella in front of her. He attempts to reconnect, but she pats him again, then nestles back in his arms. Later, they skip back to their cottage, where Alicia, sipping tea on a chair in the lounge, uncrosses her legs and saunters towards him. She tickles and pecks his nose, while Rebecca turns away, trying to hide her frustration. In New York, Rebecca sits gloomily in the back of a Green Cab as it cruises through Times Square. Her chin resting on one red woolen-gloved hand, she listens to her radio and then jumps to the floor of the cab, finding her green and purple scarf. Suze is launched across the room and submerged under a heap of books as Tall D. Freak chuckles at his roommate. Rebecca, wearing her prototype red gloves, stands before the group. At home, Rebecca rushes to the oven and eagerly shuffles through the cupboard, pulling out a giant block of chocolate with a spoon in the middle. She drops the block onto the counter and the floor, tapping at it with a red flip-flop and then a burlap slipper. She holds the smaller chunk to the floor and wrestles with it, using two magnifying glasses to melt it down, and eureka! Armed with the spoon, she goes to the market and spots a cute pineapple-shaped hat. It's the group leader, and Rebecca nods at Lainley, as the group leader clutches a pillow to her chin. On the night of the festival, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca glide up in the escalator, with Rebecca in a sequined red and gold vest. Alicia glances over at her and smirks as the escalator steps dissolve into a lavish atrium.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The cat hops backward, and the fish tickles its tail, dropping back its short, curled whiskers before floating forward as the cat leans backward. Its fuzzy, slippered paws drift in with the turtle’s hop, and clutching both its wings in theirs, the cat spins it around, curling its fins across its stomach. Keeping their noses wiggling, they drift around in a square, and it disentangles from its clutch, brushing the turtle’s shell with its twig and patting its face with its long, dangling whiskers. They pause in their final posture, holding elbow and knee, and pirouette separately. It arches forward mysteriously and waves the twig, and Fido feels both alarmed and satisfied as it blinks its pinholes at him from beneath the twig. The cat flips it once more, and slipping from its clasp, the turtle sways a rehearsed duet, flicking the twig in front of its belly, chest, and paws. Fido frowns clumsily and stomps his feet sporadically to support his uncertain hopping cohort. Abruptly, it vanishes, only to materialize beside them, jigging gently up and down, wagging the twig beside its foot. It attempts to recapture, but the turtle brushes them again, then nestles back into its paws. Later, they stroll ahead to their meadow, where Rodney, gulping grape soda on a couch in the atrium, uncrosses his arms and trudges towards her. He pets and bites its fin, while George turns around, failing to hide his excitement. In Chicago, George gazes cheerfully in the front of a Green Bus as it drives through Trafalgar Square. Its forehead leaning against one red velvet-clad finger, it taps its pager and then hops to the roof of the tram, discovering its brown and purple scarf. Lucy is catapulted towards the ceiling and buried beneath a mountain of shoes as Big E. Weird grins at his friend. George, donning its custom red hat, confronts the gathering. At work, George dashes to the oven and calmly examines through the microwave, extracting a small cube of chocolate with a coupon in the center. It shatters the cube against the table and the ceiling, pounding it with an orange rubber boot and then a finer metal mallet. It clutches the larger shard to the ceiling and tussles with it, utilizing two fans to freeze it up, and voila! Handling the coupon, it zips to the gallery and notices a lovely banana-shaped hat. It’s the friend captain, and George nods at Felicia, as the friend captain grips a coat to its temple. On the evening of the festival, Fido, Rodney, and George float down in the escalator, with George in a feathered brown and gold robe. Rodney peers up at it and grins as the escalator gates close onto a modest dining room.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Luke and a woman whirl through a dynamic dance, with her fan and hair playfully interacting with him during their routine. Despite some playful disruptions, they resume their initial positions, with Luke charmed by her flirty gestures. Later, they return to their hotel, where Alicia greets Luke with affection, leaving Rebecca disheartened. In New York, Rebecca rides in a Yellow Cab, retrieving a dress while feeling glum. She later searches frantically at home, smashing a block of ice to access a credit card. With it, she spots a melon-shaped bag and waves to her group leader. At a ball, Luke, Alicia, and Rebecca arrive together, with Rebecca adorned in a stylish jacket as they enter a grand ballroom.

melonshaped bag She holds the smaller block to the floor and wrestles with it using two hair dryers to melt it down and eureka She smashes the block onto the counter and the floor banging at it with a yellow stiletto heel and then a thicker wooden heel At home Rebecca runs to the fridge and frantically searches through the freezer bringing out a huge block of ice with a credit card in the middle her legs and struts towards him He tries to reconnect but she whacks him again then settles back in his arms Suddenly she disappears only to reappear behind him swaying wildly from side to side waving the fan in front of her Luke smiles awkwardly and claps his hands vaguely to accompany his unpredictable dancing partner she dances an improvised solo waving the fan in front of her chest waist and bottom He spins her again and breaking from his hold She leans back seductively and flicks the fan and Luke looks both startled and pleased as she flutters her eyelashes at him from behind the fan They resume their initial position holding waist and shoulder and whirl altogether Keeping their heads still they move around in a circle and she unravels from his hold whacking his cheek with her fan and slapping his face with her long tossing hair he twirls her towards him twisting her arms across her waist Her highheeled sandaled feet fall in with his dance step and holding both her hands in his He steps forward and she grasps his shoulder tossing back her long straightened hair before stepping back as he steps forward
